revised_title: A Yearly Register of Weather Patterns and Barometric Readings in Lyndon, Rutland
tldr: This article presents a detailed record of barometric readings, temperature, and rainfall in Lyndon, Rutland, for the year 1777. The author, Thomas Barker, documents the weather patterns and their effects on the local environment, including the growth of crops and the occurrence of an earthquake. The data collected provides valuable insights into the climate and weather conditions of that time.
